com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Interface IKandyChatService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IKandyPullEvents

    public interface IKandyChatService
extends IKandyPullEvents
    This interface is used to send and receive an Instant Message (IM).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Mark the chats message as received.
      void markAsReceived(IKandyEvent event, KandyResponseListener listener)
      Deprecated. 
      use IKandyEvent.markAsReceived(KandyResponseListener) instead.

      Register a callback to be invoked when a chat is received.

    • Method Detail

      • registerNotificationListener

        void registerNotificationListener(KandyChatServiceNotificationListener listener)
        Register a callback to be invoked when a chat is received.
        Parameters:
        listener - The callback that will be invoked

      • unregisterNotificationListener

        void unregisterNotificationListener(KandyChatServiceNotificationListener listener)
        Unregisters - to stop receiving ongoing chat events

      • sendChat

        void sendChat(KandyChatMessage kandyChatMessage,
              KandyResponseListener responseListener)
        Sends a chat message.
        Parameters:
        kandyChatMessage - The sent IM
        responseListener - The callback that will be invoked Whether the IM has been successfully sent. KandyResponseListener.onRequestSucceded() once the chat delivered to the server

      • sendSMS

        void sendSMS(KandySMSMessage message,
             KandyResponseListener responseListener)
        Send an SMS via Kandy services
        Parameters:
        kandyMessage - the Kandy message to send
        responseCallback - callback for handling the response - will contain error in case of failure

      • markAsReceived

        @Deprecated
void markAsReceived(IKandyEvent event,
                                 KandyResponseListener listener)
        Deprecated. use IKandyEvent.markAsReceived(KandyResponseListener) instead.

      • markAsReceived

        void markAsReceived(ArrayList<IKandyEvent> events,
                    KandyResponseListener listener)
        Mark the chats message as received.

        this will trigger KandyChatServiceNotificationListener#onChatDelivered(IKandyEvent) on the recipient

        Parameters:
        events - The received chat message, could also be passed IKandyMessage that is also an event
        listener - The callback that will be invoked

      • getSettings

        KandyChatSettings getSettings()
        Gets the settings object to configure service specific configurations
        Returns:
        The settings instance

      • downloadMedia

        void downloadMedia(IKandyMessage message,
                   KandyResponseProgressListener progressListener)
        Download the media file with progress indication
        Parameters:
        message - message that contains media file to be downloaded
        progressListener - listener for downloading progress indication the listener will pass the downloaded file's uri via callback

      • downloadMediaThumbnail

        void downloadMediaThumbnail(IKandyMessage message,
                            KandyThumbnailSize thumbnailSize,
                            KandyResponseProgressListener progressListener)
        Download the thumbnail of the media file with progress indication
        Parameters:
        message - message that contains media file to be downloaded
        thumbnailSize - The size of the thumbnail to be downloaded. Could be KandyThumbnailSize#THUMBNAIL_SMALL or KandyThumbnailSize#THUMBNAIL_MEDIUM or KandyThumbnailSize#THUMBNAIL_LARGE
        progressListener - listener for downloading progress indication the listener will pass the downloaded file's Uri via callback

      • cancelMediaTransfer

        void cancelMediaTransfer(IKandyMessage message,
                         KandyResponseCancelListener listener)
        This method used for cancel the media transfer(upload/download)
        Parameters:
        message - which transfer must be canceled
        listener - The callback that will be invoked with result of operation

      • sendUserTypingIndication

        void sendUserTypingIndication(KandyTypingIndicationItem typingIndicationItem,
                              KandyRecord destination,
                              KandyResponseListener listener)
        Send a typing indication to other user
        Parameters:
        typingIndicationItem - the typing indication object with current typing state
        destination - the other user which should recieve typing indication
        listener - callback that provides error on failure,
